As you may have noticed at the time I was hacking on that this kind of stuff want clear and I just copied what was used in ZeroTalk.  I'll try to fish out the private key for ZeroTorrent and increase the limit for all users.  Mind you back then ZeroNet had more issues with larger files than it does today.
